mapper.select: select ticketing.*, (select ai_name from airport where ai_num = ro_ai_start) as ai_start_name, (select ai_name from airport where ai_num = ro_ai_end) as ai_end_name from ticketing join schedule on ti_sk_num = sk_num join route on sk_ro_num = ro_num where ti_me_id = #{me_id} and ti_state = case when #{ticketing} = 0 then ti_state when #{ticketing} = 1 then "확정" when #{ticketing} = 2 then "미확정" when #{ticketing} = 3 then "예매취소" end;
